snippet.title: Sky Skipper (Arcade) Playthrough
snippet.description:
Isn't it just awesome that this game actually made it to the west after such a long time? It came out the same year as Donkey Kong, yet originally never saw a release outside of Japan. Why do you think that is? Let's play the game and find out!

This Playthrough will show all four main levels... I had to savestate halfway through Level 4. You're gonna see exactly why I did the moment I set up the state, don't worry.

Anyways, this game has you bombing potty-mouth gorillas and rescuing residents of Wonder-Kingdom!


A question for the viewers:

Would you take the job of protecting a kingdom from giant hostile gorillas? Honestly, it seems too risky for me.
